thread.section_title: Peaches Boutique Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Peaches Boutique | peachesboutique.com | 12 of 86
thread.title: LO

author: LO
title: LO
text:
So many dress options to choose from! Once our number came up to go into the dressing room the staff helping my daughter was excellent, patient as well as honest in what looked good on her. They were sensitive to pricing and asked what range we would like to spend.
We were a little disappointed in the accessory earing options for a younger girl but lots of shoes to choose from. We had a great experience!
